channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- tml-2fa

item.title: CVE-2023-6272|2023-12-18T20:07:55.945Z -- unknown -- tml-2fa
item.description: The Theme My Login 2FA WordPress plugin before 1.2 does not rate limit 2FA validation attempts, which may allow an attacker to brute-force all possibilities, which shouldn't be too long, as the 2FA codes are 6 digits.
